TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFile extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFile abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供创建、解压缩和打开 zip 存档的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods for creating, extracting, and opening zip archives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要使用类，必须添加对引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`项目; 中的程序集否则，你将得到以下错误消息，当尝试编译： **的当前上下文中不存在ZipFile的名称**.To use the class, you must add a reference to the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project; otherwise, you'll get the following error message when trying to compile : **The name 'ZipFile' does not exist in the current context**. 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中添加到你的项目的引用的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加或删除引用使用引用管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1aabb520-99b0-46c6-9368-21b4d84793eb)。For more information on how to add a reference to your project in Visual Studio, see [How to: Add or Remove References By Using the Reference Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1aabb520-99b0-46c6-9368-21b4d84793eb). 用于操作的 zip 存档和其文件的方法将分布在三个类： ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their files are spread across three classes: , and . |自。。。To…|使用...Use…| |---------|----------| |从目录中创建的 zip 存档Create a zip archive from a directory|| |提取到目录的 zip 存档的内容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |将新文件添加到现有的 zip 存档Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |检索 zip 存档中的文件Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |检索所有的 zip 存档中的文件Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |若要打开单个文件的流中包含的 zip 存档To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |从 zip 存档中删除文件Delete a file from a zip archive|| 不能使用或中的类[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。You cannot use the or classes in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用，你应使用以下类处理的压缩文件。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you should use the following classes to work with compressed files. - - - - ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建和使用提取某个 zip 存档类。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩成 zip 存档，，然后该将内容提取到一个新文件夹。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. > [!TIP] > 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包含指定目录的文件和目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName);
.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub CreateFromDirectory (sourceDirectoryName As String, destinationArchiveFileName As String)
public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要存档的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要生成的存档路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包含指定目录的文件和目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 此方法重载不存档中包括的基目录，并且不允许你指定的压缩级别。This method overload does not include the base directory in the archive and does not allow you to specify a compression level. 如果你想要包括的基目录，或指定压缩级别，请调用方法重载。If you want to include the base directory or specify a compression level, call the method overload. 如果存档已存在，引发异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建和使用提取某个 zip 存档类。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩成 zip 存档，，然后该将内容提取到一个新文件夹。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 是 ，仅包含空格，或包含至少一个无效字符。

exception.span: 在 或 内，指定的路径、文件名或者两者都超出了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: In or , the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，文件名长度不得超过 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 无效或不存在（例如，在未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: is invalid or does not exist (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 已存在。

span.span: already exists.

span.span: A file in the specified directory could not be opened.

exception.span: 指定目录。

exception.span: 调用方不具有访问在 中指定的目录或在 中指定的文件的所需权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the directory specified in or the file specified in .

span.span: or contains an invalid format.

exception.span: zip 存档不支持写入。

span.span: The zip archive does not support writing.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory);

.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory) cil managed

public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要存档的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要生成的存档路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.name: includeBaseDirectory
param.span: 包括来自于存档的根的 sourceDirectoryName 的目录名称，则为 ；仅包含目录中的内容，则为 。

span.span: to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; to include only the contents of the directory.

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包括指定目录的文件和目录，使用指定压缩级别，以及可以选择包含基目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 使用此方法重载来指定压缩级别以及是否要包含在存档中的基目录。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果存档已存在，引发异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建和使用提取某个 zip 存档类。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩成 zip 存档，，然后该将内容提取到一个新文件夹。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive, and then extracts that content to a new folder. 当压缩存档，基目录将包含和压缩级别设置为对该操作的速度追求超过了效率。When compressing the archive, the base directory is included and the compression level is set to emphasize the speed of the operation over efficiency. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CreateFromDirectory (string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);

.method public static hidebysig void CreateFromDirectory(string sourceDirectoryName, string destinationArchiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed

public: static void CreateFromDirectory(System::String ^ sourceDirectoryName, System::String ^ destinationArchiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::CompressionLevel compressionLevel, bool includeBaseDirectory, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: sourceDirectoryName
param.span: 要存档的目录的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: destinationArchiveFileName
param.span: 要生成的存档路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 指示创建项时是否强调速度或压缩有效性的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

param.name: includeBaseDirectory
param.span: 包括来自于存档的根的 sourceDirectoryName 的目录名称，则为 ；仅包含目录中的内容，则为 。

span.span: to include the directory name from sourceDirectoryName at the root of the archive; to include only the contents of the directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 创建 zip 存档，该存档包括文件和指定目录的目录，使用指定压缩级别和条目名称的字符编码，以及可以选择包含基目录。

span.span: Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level and character encoding for entry names, and optionally includes the base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从文件系统的目录结构将保留在存档中。The directory structure from the file system is preserved in the archive. 如果此目录为空，则创建空存档。If the directory is empty, an empty archive is created. 使用此方法重载来指定压缩级别和字符编码，以及是否要包含在存档中的基目录。Use this method overload to specify the compression level and character encoding, and whether to include the base directory in the archive. 如果存档已存在，引发异常。If the archive already exists, an exception is thrown. 如果在存档中已存在一个具有指定名称的项，第二个条目被创建具有相同的名称。If an entry with the specified name already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 如果无法将目录中的文件添加到存档，存档左不完整和无效，并且该方法将引发异常。If a file in the directory cannot be added to the archive, the archive is left incomplete and invalid, and the method throws an exception. 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，通过使用指定的编码进行编码条目名称。If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the entry names are encoded by using the specified encoding. 如果指定的编码为 utf-8，为每个条目，设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言If the specified encoding is a UTF-8, the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set for each entry, 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称是根据以下规则进行编码：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, the entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含 ASCII 范围外的字符的项名称，设置语言编码标志，并使用 utf-8 编码条目名称。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and UTF-8 is used to encode the entry name. - 仅包含 ASCII 字符的项名称，设置语言编码标志，和当前的系统默认代码页用于编码条目名称。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is set, and the current system default code page is used to encode the entry names.

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName);

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要解压缩存档的路径。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 放置解压缩文件的目录的路径，指定为相对或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的目录及其所有子目录。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目标目录不能已存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 验证中的路径与异常`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`参数引发之前提取。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否则，如果提取过程中发生错误，保持部分提取存档。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项均具有到存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建和使用提取某个 zip 存档类。This example shows how to create and extract a zip archive by using the class. 它将文件夹的内容压缩成 zip 存档，该将内容提取到一个新文件夹。It compresses the contents of a folder into a zip archive and extracts that content to a new folder. 若要使用 类，必须在项目中引用 `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` 程序集。To use the class, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.zipfile/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: The specified path in or exceeds the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径长度不得超过 248 个字符，文件名长度不得超过 260 个字符。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 指定的目录已存在。

span.span: The directory specified by already exists.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 存档中的一个条目名是 ，仅包含空格，或者包含至少一个无效字符。

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 提取存档条目将生成在 指定的目录之外的一个文件。

span.span: Extracting an archive entry would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, overwriteFiles As Boolean)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, bool overwriteFiles);
public static void ExtractToDirectory (string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(string sourceArchiveFileName, string destinationDirectoryName, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ExtractToDirectory (sourceArchiveFileName As String, destinationDirectoryName As String, entryNameEncoding As Encoding)
public: static void ExtractToDirectory(System::String ^ sourceArchiveFileName, System::String ^ destinationDirectoryName, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: sourceArchiveFileName
param.span: 要解压缩存档的路径。

span.span: The path to the archive that is to be extracted.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 放置解压缩文件的目录的路径，指定为相对或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the directory in which to place the extracted files, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 将指定 zip 存档中的所有文件解压缩到文件系统的一目录下，并使用项名称的指定字符编码。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the specified zip archive to a directory on the file system and uses the specified character encoding for entry names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的目录及其所有子目录。This method creates the specified directory and all subdirectories. 目标目录不能已存在。The destination directory cannot already exist. 验证中的路径与异常`destinationDirectoryName`或`sourceArchiveFileName`参数引发之前提取。Exceptions related to validating the paths in the `destinationDirectoryName` or `sourceArchiveFileName` parameters are thrown before extraction. 否则，如果提取过程中发生错误，保持部分提取存档。Otherwise, if an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项均具有到存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 不设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言的位置的项名称，通过使用指定的编码解码条目名称。For entry names where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the entry names are decoded by using the specified encoding. - 对于其中设置语言编码标志的条目，通过使用 utf-8 解码条目名称。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8. 如果`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：If `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 对于其中不设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言的条目，通过使用当前的系统默认代码页解码条目名称。For entries where the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, entry names are decoded by using the current system default code page. - 对于其中设置语言编码标志的条目，通过使用 utf-8 解码条目名称。For entries where the language encoding flag is set, the entry names are decoded by using UTF-8.

summary.span: 以指定的模式打开指定路径上的 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open (string archiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open(string archiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode) cil managed
Public Shared Function Open (archiveFileName As String, mode As ZipArchiveMode) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ Open(System::String ^ archiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指定允许对打开的存档中的项进行的操作的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions which are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

summary.span: 以指定的模式打开指定路径上的 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path and in the specified mode.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档从枚举为的文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with from the enumeration as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，引发异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 设置`mode`参数等效于调用方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档作为文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档已存在，引发。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档作为文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存在存档，它打开。If the archive exists, it is opened. 可以修改现有条目，并可以创建新项。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果存档不存在，则创建新存档;但是，创建在 zip 存档模式不是创建在尽可能高效模式。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在更新模式中打开 zip 存档并到存档中添加一个条目。The following example shows how to open a zip archive in the update mode and add an entry to the archive. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open (string archiveFileName, System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive Open(string archiveFileName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode mode, class System.Text.Encoding entryNameEncoding) cil managed
Public Shared Function Open (archiveFileName As String, mode As ZipArchiveMode, entryNameEncoding As Encoding) As ZipArchive
public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ Open(System::String ^ archiveFileName, System::IO::Compression::ZipArchiveMode mode, System::Text::Encoding ^ entryNameEncoding);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The path to the archive to open, specified as a relative or absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指定允许对打开的存档中的项进行的操作的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the actions that are allowed on the entries in the opened archive.

param.name: entryNameEncoding
param.span: 在存档中读取或写入项名时使用的编码。

span.span: The encoding to use when reading or writing entry names in this archive.

param.span: 仅当需要针对具有不支持项名的 UTF-8 编码的 zip 归档工具和库的互操作性进行编码时，为此参数指定一个值。

span.span: Specify a value for this parameter only when an encoding is required for interoperability with zip archive tools and libraries that do not support UTF-8 encoding for entry names.

summary.span: 在指定模式下，在指定路径中，使用项名称的指定字符编码打开 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive at the specified path, in the specified mode, and by using the specified character encoding for entry names.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档作为文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，引发异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. 设置`mode`参数等效于调用方法。Setting the `mode` parameter to is equivalent to calling the method. 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档作为文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档已存在，引发。If the archive already exists, an is thrown. 当你将设置`mode`参数，使用打开存档作为文件模式值。When you set the `mode` parameter to , the archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存在存档，它打开。If the archive exists, it is opened. 可以修改现有条目，并可以创建新项。The existing entries can be modified and new entries can be created. 如果存档不存在，则创建新存档;但是，创建在 zip 存档模式不是创建在尽可能高效模式。If the archive does not exist, a new archive is created; however, creating a zip archive in mode is not as efficient as creating it in mode. 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 如果未设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言，当前的系统默认代码页用于解码条目名称。When the language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is not set, the current system default code page is used to decode the entry name. - 设置语言编码标志后，utf-8 用于对条目名称解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 当打开读取的 zip 存档文件和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，条目名称解码根据下列规则：When you open a zip archive file for reading and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, entry names are decoded according to the following rules: - 编码标志的语言未设置时，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于解码条目名称。When the language encoding flag is not set, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to decode the entry name. - 设置语言编码标志后，utf-8 用于对条目名称解码。When the language encoding flag is set, UTF-8 is used to decode the entry name. 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置为`null`，条目名称是根据以下规则进行编码：When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to `null`, entry names are encoded according to the following rules: - 包含 ASCII 范围外的字符的项名称，设置语言编码标志，并通过使用 utf-8 条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain characters outside the ASCII range, the language encoding flag is set, and entry names are encoded by using UTF-8. - 仅包含 ASCII 字符的项名称，未设置语言编码标志，并通过使用当前的系统默认代码页的条目名称进行编码。For entry names that contain only ASCII characters, the language encoding flag is not set, and entry names are encoded by using the current system default code page. 当你编写以将文件存档和`entryNameEncoding`设置一个值为非`null`，指定`entryNameEncoding`用于转换为字节编码条目名称。When you write to archive files and `entryNameEncoding` is set to a value other than `null`, the specified `entryNameEncoding` is used to encode the entry names into bytes. 仅当指定的编码为 utf-8 编码时设置编码标志 （在本地文件头的通用的位标志） 的语言。The language encoding flag (in the general-purpose bit flag of the local file header) is set only when the specified encoding is a UTF-8 encoding.

public: static System::IO::Compression::ZipArchive ^ OpenRead(System::String ^ archiveFileName);

param.name: archiveFileName
param.span: 要打开的存档的路径，指定为相对路径或绝对路径。

summary.span: 打开在指定路径用于读取的 zip 存档。

span.span: Opens a zip archive for reading at the specified path.
The opened zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用方法和设置`mode`参数。This method is equivalent to calling the method and setting the `mode` parameter to . 使用打开存档作为文件模式值。The archive is opened with as the file mode value. 如果存档不存在，引发异常。If the archive does not exist, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开用于读取的 zip 存档。The following example shows how to open a zip archive for reading. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 未找到 中指定的文件。

span.span: The file specified in is not found.

exception.span: 包含无效的格式。

span.span: contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 无法解释为 zip 存档文件。

span.span: could not be interpreted as a zip archive.
